name: Pot Luck
description:
A game about starting with nothing, and sharing everything.

Created by one person in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 45 Compo.

Entertain your friends at a pot luck, which always begins with nothing on the table. As your friends arrive, you can pick which of their special recipes they bring to your table. Make sure everyone finds something good to eat, or they’ll leave and take their dish with them! Make your friends happy enough to invite you to their parties, and you win.
